name: Bitventure Boss Fight
description:
Gobby found the way out of this hellish song-scape...BUT GEORGE THE FLYING LEAF MAN IS TRYING TO STOP HIM FROM ESCAPING!! Help Gobby capture all of the fire crystals to destroy George the Flying Leaf Man...before George the Flying Leaf Man Destroys him...

Oh also, did I mention that George the Flying Leaf Man is controlled by none other than...YOUR OWN FRIEND!! (Or your right hand 0_0)

Controls: 

Gobby: WASD to move, Space to shoot laser

George the Flying Leaf Man: Left Mouse Click
